defines.name: LIBCALL_ENABLEINTERRUPT
defines.brief: To prevent compiler/linker crashes with enable interrupt library, we must define LIBCALL_ENABLEINTERRUPT before importing EnableInterrupt within a library.

defines.name: STREAM_CSV_ROW
defines.initializer:
stream->print("\"");                                         \
    stream->print(firstCol);                                     \
    stream->print("\",");                                        \
    for (uint8_t i = 0; i < getArrayVarCount(); i++) {           \
        stream->print("\"");                                     \
        stream->print(function);                                 \
        stream->print("\"");                                     \
        if (i + 1 != getArrayVarCount()) { stream->print(","); } \
    }                                                            \
    stream->println();
defines.brief: This is a PRE-PROCESSOR MACRO to speed up generating header rows.
defines.description: THIS IS NOT A FUNCTION, it is a pre-processor macro
